brief_description: An adaptation of Cormac McCarthy’s bleak apocalyptic novel starring Viggo Mortensen, Australian actor Kodi Smit-McPhee and Charlise Theron.

constellations_other.name: Outlaws and the end
constellations_other.description: Tracing connections from Sweet Country to Australian westerns and resistance to white colonial narratives.

creator_credit_for_label: John Hillcoat, Margot Wilson, Joe Penhall, Steve Schwartz, Paula Mae Schwartz, Chris Kennedy, Nick Wechsler, Chockstone Pictures, Nick Wechsler Productions, 2929 Productions and Dimension Films
description: A father and his son walk alone through burned America. Nothing moves in the ravaged landscape save the ash on the wind and water. It is cold enough to crack stones, and, when the snow falls it is gray. The sky is dark. Their destination is the warmer south, although they don’t know what, if anything, awaits them there.
